interactable.Name: Cave
interactable.DiscoveredString: You spot a dark, dank cave.

Interaction.InteractionValue: You decide to peek into the cave mouth.
You turn tail and run the other direction.

interactable.Name: Shack
interactable.DiscoveredString: There seems to be a plume of smoke extending from a nearby Shack

interactable.Name: Forest
interactable.DiscoveredString: You spot a forest with a sense of dread eminating from its perimeter.

interactable.Name: Beach
interactable.DiscoveredString: You stumble across a beautiful golden beach teaming with life.

interactable.Name: Abandoned Mine
interactable.DiscoveredString: You have found a long abandoned dwarven mine. The bowels of which have long since been scraped clean of any valuable ore that was once abundant here.
